page.title: 06Home Life continued
page.content: At eleven o clock we come back in and do some work. At five to twelve we play hang man and at twelve o clock we have dinner. We have an hour for dinner, then the bell goes and we go in and have some story. Then we might watch Music Time or do some singing or we go straight into work. At three o clock we go home. Well, I walk home and I get my playing clothes on and go and play with my friends. Tea is at ten to five so we go in for tea. When we have finished tea we go and call for the little ones and then at half seven we go in and watch telly and then we go to bed.
